title: [FEATURE] Move the Linux builds out of Cake
body:
Right now, all the builds use Cake as the main engine for building. This makes it very easy to share code and ensure everything uses all the same things, except for the final bits. 

This causes issues because Cake requires mono, and although it is pretty cross-platform, it is an additional requirement. Building SkiaSharp does not actually use it, and we can maybe have a bash script or Makefile to do this.

We can probably make the script be able to turn off and on feature sets. For example, fontconfig, gpu, encoders...
